# Trusted Consulting Company For Your Digital Strategy

Elevate your digital store with our expert digital strategy consultants. As a leading digital consulting agency, we provide a comprehensive strategy for your business growth


Back To Services Strategy & Consulting Overview Driving digital transformations via collaborative, concise, and creative strategy and consulting services! Building meaningful customer experiences is how a business can scale, and impending seamless digital experiences require a lot of quick yet purpose-driven decisions. We at Krish follow a holistic digital strategy and consulting procedure that involves uncovering business needs, extracting context, inputting discussions around technical implementation, and everything in between. Well begun is half done, and thus, putting efforts into discovery and planning is what we do best. Brands Helping online-exclusive retailers create intuitive shopping experiences with fully customizable, high-performing digital businesses via offering the best-suited digital experience consultation. Retailers / Traders Enabling retailers in planning and managing their online and offline operations using comprehensive and agile omnichannel digital solutions via thorough business discovery. D2C Bringing customer-centricity to the center stage to create impeccable shopping experiences for D2C businesses through 360-degree business findings. Schedule a Call What are the challenges brands face? The fast-paced digital landscape demands robust planning in the initial stages to combat the challenges of today and tomorrow. To pivot with the changing environment and meet customer expectations, assessing your business expectations is crucial. Customer Centricity Aligning your digital experience strategy with rapidly evolving, or rather exploding, customer expectations is the top challenge that needs to be addressed. Technology Landscapes Selecting a powerful digital experience platform (DXP), managing it to drive success, and choosing the best-suited integrations tops the list of challenges. Omnichannel Experiences Being and staying omnichannel is yet another crucial challenge in order to offer consistent, connected digital experiences across touchpoints. Flexibility & Scalability Developing a technical architecture that moves and grows as your business does is again an important aspect for overall flexibility and scalability. Our Approach Working with mainstream brands for over 20 years, we have developed a dependable digital experience consulting and discovery flow where each stage is dedicated to a milestone in preparing a roadmap. Let's Get Started 1 Strategy & Planning The requirement gathering stage is defining and understanding the business goals and devising a strategy. Business model understanding and GAP analysis Target market understanding Competitors & current trends analysis Defining digital transformation roadmap 2 Solution Design The stage where technical infrastructure, marketing goals, and commerce touchpoints are mapped and defined. Digital strategy and consulting services offer an in-depth analysis of information and technical architecture to study and assess the current positioning, provide a roadmap to move forward, offer expert business consultation for platforms and integrations, and help businesses with a well-suited digital strategy that can drive success. Why choose Krish for Digital Strategy & Consulting services? At Krish, we follow a discovery process to understand your brand, business needs, customers, and goals. Via technical, design, marketing, and customer-experience audits, we identify areas of opportunity and present a holistic growth plan that involves consultation and actionable recommendations for the tech architecture, user interface (UI), digital marketing, and customer experience (CX). This allows you to conduct a cost-benefit analysis and determine the right approach to grow. How much does it cost for Digital Strategy & Consulting services? It largely depends upon the nature of your business and the digital model needed to achieve the desired results. We have various audits in place to assess different areas that meet your needs. The cost for technical consulting, design suggestions, marketing recommendations, and overall digital business consulting services varies. Get in touch with our experts to understand more. How much time does the Strategy & Consultation process take? We have pre-defined questionnaires ready, which makes the initial information-gathering easy. After thoroughly assessing the answers, our expert digital experience consultants will prepare a suitable recommendation document and discuss it with your stakeholders. The approximate turnaround time (TAT) depends on the kind of consultation you need. For example, all-inclusive digital strategy and consulting might take longer than only digital marketing consulting. Trusted by leading brands
